entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 3:31 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 2.0°C
Wind: E 28 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Fog patches. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:35 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:35 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 3. Forecast issued 3:35 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
